Body: Possible Duplicate:  Can I install additional languages on Android?  I bought a Samsung Galaxy S2 in China and have used it in English but now I bought the new S3 and want to sell my S2.  Since I live in Norway I need to be able to change the language to Norwegian, but it only has some Asian languages (four of them) and English UK, English US.  Is it possible to add the languages that are missing?
Title: Chinese-bought Samsung Galaxy S2 has a very limited language list

history.Text: I bought a Samsung Galaxy S2 in China and have used it in english but now I bought the new S3 and want to sell my S2, since I live in Norway I need to be able to change the language to Norwegian, but it only has some asian languages (4 of them) and english uk, english us... is it possible to add the languages that are missing?
